modmenu.nameTranslation.tlsywen: The Last Sword You Will Ever Need: Remastered
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.tlsywen: A mod for minecraft that adds an incredible sword. It is a sword that can one hit KO the Ender Dragon.
modmenu.summaryTranslation.tlsywen: This is a remastered version of The Last Sword You Will Ever Need, trying to restore the setting of version 1.7.10 as much as possible!
resourcePack.tlsywen.classic_look.name: Classic Look
resourcePack.tlsywen.classic_look.descri: The classic look of The Last Sword You Will Ever Need
